text: Nena, “Choonadi chimachokera kwa Ambuye wanu. Amene afuna akhulupirire ndipo amene safuna akane. Ndithudi anthu oipa tawakonzera moto umene mphanda zake zidzawazungulira.” Pamene iwo adzapempha madzi akumwa adzapatsidwa madzi otentha ngati mkuwa wosungunuka amene adzaotcha nkhope zawo. Kuipa kwa chakumwa ndi kuipa kwa malo okhala ndi kumeneku
